      • isAdvertisingSupportedByChipset

        public final boolean isAdvertisingSupportedByChipset()
        Checks to see if the device supports advertising. This is forwarded from BleManager.isAdvertisingSupportedByChipset().

      • isAdvertisingSupported

        public final boolean isAdvertisingSupported()
        Checks to see if the device supports advertising BLE services. This is forwarded from BleManager.isAdvertisingSupported().

      • isAdvertising

        public final boolean isAdvertising()
        Checks to see if the device is currently advertising.

      • isAdvertising

        public final boolean isAdvertising​(java.util.UUID serviceUuid)
        Checks to see if the device is currently advertising the given UUID.

      • startAdvertising

        public final AdvertisingListener.AdvertisingEvent startAdvertising​(BleScanRecord advertisePacket,
                                                                   BleAdvertisingSettings settings,
                                                                   AdvertisingListener listener)
        Starts advertising serviceUuids with the information supplied in BleScanRecord. Note that this will only work for devices on Lollipop, or above. Even then, not every device supports advertising. Use BleManager.isAdvertisingSupported() to check to see if the phone supports it.

      • stopAdvertising

        public final void stopAdvertising()
        Stops the server from advertising.

      • getName

        public final java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name this BleServer is using (and will be advertised as, if applicable).

      • setName

        public final boolean setName​(java.lang.String name)
        Set the name you wish this BleServer to be known as. This will affect how other devices see this server, and sets the name on the lower level BluetoothAdapter. If you DO change this, please be aware this will affect everything, including apps outside of your own. It's probably best NOT to use this, but it's here for flexibility.
        Returns:
        true if the name was successfully set. This can return false if BLE is turned off -- so the underlying BluetoothAdapter is null.

      • resetAdaptorName

        public final void resetAdaptorName()

      • getNative

        public final BluetoothGattServer getNative()
        Provides just-in-case lower-level access to the native server instance. See similar warning for BleDevice.getNative().

      • getNativeLayer

        public final IBluetoothServer getNativeLayer()
        Provides just-in-case access to the abstracted server instance. See similar warning for BleDevice.getNative().

      • getStateMask

        public final int getStateMask​(java.lang.String macAddress)

      • getNativeBleDescriptor

        public BleDescriptor getNativeBleDescriptor​(java.util.UUID serviceUuid,
                                            java.util.UUID charUuid,
                                            java.util.UUID descUuid)
        Returns the BleDescriptor for the given UUID in case you need lower-level access. Note that this will never return a null instance. You need to call P_NativeGattObject.isNull() to check if the BluetoothGattDescriptor actually exists (in other words, it will return true if we were unable to find the requested descriptor).
        Specified by:
        getNativeBleDescriptor in interface IBleNode

      • getNativeBleCharacteristic

        public BleCharacteristic getNativeBleCharacteristic​(java.util.UUID serviceUuid,
                                                    java.util.UUID charUuid)
        Returns the native characteristic for the given UUID for when you have characteristics with identical uuids under different services. Note that this will never return a null instance. You need to call P_NativeGattObject.isNull() to check if the BluetoothGattCharacteristic actually exists (in other words, it will return true if we were unable to find the requested characteristic).
        Specified by:
        getNativeBleCharacteristic in interface IBleNode
